title: You are cutting up a pie. First you cut it into two pieces. With your next cut, you produce 4 pieces. The third cut results in 7 pieces. How many pieces can you cut with seven slices? - Quora

response.answer_text: As we have to find the maximum no of pieces we can cut with 7 cuts we can use (cake cutting formula) Where with n cuts, you can divide a circle into at most f(n) parts, where:  Answer 29 piece Here's a link i found http://mathworld.wolfram.com/CircleDivisionbyLines.html
1cut-2ps 2cut-4ps 3cut-8ps(keep all PS in same line and cut it half) 4cut-16ps……… ………… ……N cuts-2^N ps therefore ans is 2^7
